shots.description: A simple but well executed walk-and-talk.  We start with a tilt down on the actors as they emerge from the subway and proceed down the sidewalk.  This is another shot demonstrating perfection of the basics.
shots.operatorComments: Casey's Bar in downtown LA standing in for NYC. This was my first time operating for Roger Deakins (with Norman Jewison directing), so although it was a deceptively simple shot I wanted it to be perfecto.
